resources.string: Roche Sight Chart
This is a vision test. It will just take a few minutes. Click on the power button of your controller to start.
Data has been cleared
Calibration phase.

Move the joystick left, right, up or down to position the circle in your field of view. Hold the trigger button and push the joystick up if you canâ€™t see anything or click on the trigger button to validate the position.
First left eye
Good, now right eye
High contrast test
Push the joystick in the same direction as the E is facing, up, down, left or right. If you can no longer see, just click on the trigger button.
Now you will begin the Low Contrast Test. This will be slightly harder, but give it your best attempt
Now the contrast sensitivity test
The test is starting
End of test. If you had no issues completing the test, do you want to submit these results? Press the trigger button for yes, or press the power button for no
Thank you for completing the test, your results have been submitted.
Thank you for completing the test.
Unfortunately you have not finished your test.
Please do your best and guess the direction of E
If you still cannot guess the direction of E, please press the trigger button.
SightPlus will now start
For the left eye, result is
For the right eye, result is
your test results are different from the previous tests, please repeat the test in 2 hours."
Now you will begin the Low Contrast Test. This will be slightly harder, but give it your best attempt"
Battery is
percent charged.
